title: Invisible Corporate Mundo Q - Infected Cleavers

embed.description: Taken on 12 March 2015, Corporate Mundo cleaver bug.

body:
So I don't know how many people have come across this, but playing a normal game just then, me and my friends/team noticed that the enemy Mundo was throwing invisible cleavers. Everyone on our team could not see it, the enemy team claimed they could see his cleavers mid throw (have to assume they were right).
But I filmed it, and from my screen it is clear that the visuals simply weren't there, but the impact of hitting something still existed.

replies.body: Had this bug yesterday during a normal, good it wasn't ranked.  It was still annoying because it was a mundo support.  Invisible cleavers for days. It's a problem if it's still persisting 3 months later.  Rito pls.

Same thing happens with Nidalee occasionally. And a whole bunch of other inconsistent stuff.

This is ultimately a bug, though, and should be reported [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
Just found out now, when we had a Mundo, it is every skin. He had the green Mundo skin, and the enemy team complained that they could not see his cleavers, while we could
